thread.title: Steve Weatherford expected to sign with Jets, punt vs. Pats
thread.title_full: Steve Weatherford expected to sign with Jets, punt vs. Pats - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Steve Weatherford expected to sign with Jets, punt vs. Pats
text:
Eric Gay/AP Steve Weatherford, who spent the past four season punting for the Giants, likely to join the Jets after an injury to Ryan Quigley and be in uniform when Gang Green faces the Patriots on Sunday. The Jets are bringing back a familiar face.
Gang Green is re-signing punter Steve Weatherford, according to sources. Weatherford will, at least temporarily, replace Ryan Quigley who has a right shin injury and was added to the injury report Saturday as questionable for Sunday's contest against the Patriots. It’s unclear when Quigley suffered the injury, but one possibility is that he was hurt when his punt was blocked by Washington last week. It’s also unknown how long he is expected to be out.
Weatherford was with the Jets in 2009 and 2010 before heading across New Jersey to join the Giants in from 2011-2014. He was cut by the Giants in early September.
